SceneDescription.name: Endgame
SceneDescription.description:
No words could possibly express the amount of ice cold rage you feel. You move toward the door of the office. Lord Borkus puts down his pen.
Lord Borkus: Is there something wrong?”
You say nothing, but do stop to stare at a very expensive-looking, fancy vase that sits on a decorate display pillar next to the door.
Lord Borkus: What are you doing? What’s the matter with you?
